#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
int main()
{

    long int t,k;
    scanf("%ld",&t);
    long long count,i,n,sum;
    while(t--)
    {
        count=0;
       sum=0;
        scanf("%lld%ld",&n,&k);
      if(k==1)
        count=n;
      else
      {
          while(n!=0)
          {
              sum=n%k;
              count+=sum;
              n/=k;
          }
      }

        printf("%lld\n",count);
    }
    return 0;
}
